titles: The vvhipper vvhipt being a reply upon a scandalous pamphlet, called The whip, abusing that excellent work of Cornelius Burges, Dr in divinity, one of the Assembly of Divines, entituled, The fire of the sanctuary newly discovered / inserti authoris, Qui Mockat, Mockabitur.
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
notes: Attributed to Quarles by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of imprint suggested by Wing.
This item can also be found as the third part of Wing Q113 (The profest royalist) which appears at reel 224:4.
Reproduction of original in the Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Burges, Cornelius, 1589?-1665. --  Fire of the sanctuarie newly uncovered.
